# T3BrapiHelpers

Helpers for working with **BrAPI** services and **The Triticeae Toolbox
(T3)** from R. This package provides small, composable utilities that
make it easier to authenticate, query, and transform BrAPI data into
formats suitable for downstream T3 workflows.

------------------------------------------------------------------------

## Requirements

This package operates on `BrAPIConnection` R6 objects created by the
**BrAPI** package.

- Install BrAPI from GitHub (not CRAN)
- Functions expect a valid `BrAPIConnection` its methods
- Examples that query live servers require an internet connection

------------------------------------------------------------------------

## Installation

You can install the development version from GitHub:

``` r
# install.packages("pak")
pak::pak("jeanlucj/T3BrapiHelpers")
#>  Found  1  deps for  0/1  pkgs [⠋] Resolving jeanlucj/T3BrapiHelpers Found  1  deps for  0/1  pkgs [⠙] Resolving jeanlucj/T3BrapiHelpers Found  1  deps for  0/1  pkgs [⠹] Resolving jeanlucj/T3BrapiHelpers Found  1  deps for  0/1  pkgs [⠸] Resolving jeanlucj/T3BrapiHelpers Found  11  deps for  1/1  pkgs [⠼] Resolving standard (CRAN/BioC) packages                                                                             
#> ℹ No downloads are needed
#>  Installing...              ✔ 1 pkg + 37 deps: kept 38 [1.1s]
```

------------------------------------------------------------------------

## Package goals

The main goals of **T3BrapiHelpers** are to:

- simplify common BrAPI queries used in T3 pipelines
- reduce redundant code going from BrAPI responses to data.frames
- make exploratory BrAPI work easier from R

------------------------------------------------------------------------

## Quick start

``` r
# Connect to a BrAPI endpoint
brapiConn <- BrAPI::createBrAPIConnection("wheat-sandbox.triticeaetoolbox.org",
                                          is_breedbase = TRUE)

# Retrieve trial metadata for "Wheat"
all_trials <- T3BrapiHelpers::getAllTrialMetaData(brapiConn, "Wheat")
head(all_trials)
#> # A tibble: 6 × 12
#>   study_db_id study_name     study_type study_description location_name trial_db_id
#>   <chr>       <chr>          <chr>      <chr>             <chr>         <chr>      
#> 1 7658        1RS-Dry_2012_… phenotypi… , 1RS drought ex… Davis, CA     343        
#> 2 7040        1RS-Irr_2012_… phenotypi… , 1RS drought ex… Davis, CA     343        
#> 3 8128        2017_WestLafa… <NA>       2017 trial        West Lafayet… 368        
#> 4 8129        2018_WestLafa… <NA>       2018 trial        West Lafayet… 368        
#> 5 8200        2020_Y1_1      phenotypi… 2020 Y1-1 ACRE    West Lafayet… 9287       
#> 6 8202        2020_Y1_2      phenotypi… 2020 Y1-2 ACRE    West Lafayet… 9287       
#> # ℹ 6 more variables: start_date <dttm>, end_date <dttm>, program_name <chr>,
#> #   common_crop_name <chr>, experimental_design <chr>, create_date <dttm>
```

------------------------------------------------------------------------

## Typical workflow

A common pattern when using this package is:

1.  Connect to a BrAPI server
2.  Retrieve core objects (studies, trials, germplasm)
3.  Normalize or reshape results
4.  Export or pass results to T3 tooling

``` r
wheatConn <- BrAPI::createBrAPIConnection("wheat.triticeaetoolbox.org",
                                          is_breedbase = TRUE)

predict_trial_vec_Wheat <- c("10673", "10674", "10675", "10676", "10677", "10678", "10679", "10680", "10681")

predict_trial_meta <- predict_trial_vec_Wheat |>
  T3BrapiHelpers::getTrialMetaDataFromTrialVec(wheatConn)

predict_germ <- predict_trial_meta$study_db_id |>
  T3BrapiHelpers::getGermplasmFromTrialVec(wheatConn)
#> ■■■■ 11% | ETA: 0s ■■■■■■■■ 22% | ETA: 9s ■■■■■■■■■■■ 33% | ETA: 10s
#> ■■■■■■■■■■■■■■ 44% | ETA: 10s ■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■ 56% | ETA: 12s
#> ■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■ 67% | ETA: 8s ■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■ 78% | ETA: 5s
#> ■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■ 89% | ETA: 3s

nAccPerTrial <- predict_germ |> dplyr::group_by(studyDbId) |>
  dplyr::summarise(nAccInTrial=dplyr::n())
```

------------------------------------------------------------------------

## Relationship to other tools

- **BrAPI**: This package assumes familiarity with the BrAPI
  specification and does not attempt to mirror it completely.

------------------------------------------------------------------------

## Documentation

Full documentation is available at  
<https://jeanlucj.github.io/T3BrapiHelpers/>

------------------------------------------------------------------------

## Development status

This package is under active development.

- APIs may change
- Function names and signatures are not yet stable
- Feedback and issues are welcome

------------------------------------------------------------------------

## Contributing

Issues are welcome. Please include a minimal reproducible example when
reporting bugs.

------------------------------------------------------------------------

## License

MIT © Jean-Luc Jannink

# Package index

## All functions

- [`covariance_combiner()`](https://jeanlucj.github.io/T3BrapiHelpers/reference/covariance_combiner.md)
  : EM Covariance Combiner
- [`covcomb_compute_conditional_expectation()`](https://jeanlucj.github.io/T3BrapiHelpers/reference/covcomb_compute_conditional_expectation.md)
  : Compute conditional expectation for the E-step of the EM algorithm
- [`covcomb_compute_log_likelihood()`](https://jeanlucj.github.io/T3BrapiHelpers/reference/covcomb_compute_log_likelihood.md)
  : Compute the observed data log-likelihood
- [`covcomb_compute_sampling_covariance()`](https://jeanlucj.github.io/T3BrapiHelpers/reference/covcomb_compute_sampling_covariance.md)
  : Compute the sampling covariance matrix for the combined covariance
  matrix
- [`covcomb_initialize_psi()`](https://jeanlucj.github.io/T3BrapiHelpers/reference/covcomb_initialize_psi.md)
  : Initialize the combined covariance matrix using available variances
- [`getAllTrialMetaData()`](https://jeanlucj.github.io/T3BrapiHelpers/reference/getAllTrialMetaData.md)
  : Retrieve metadata on all trials for a given crop
- [`getGenoProtocolFromGermVec()`](https://jeanlucj.github.io/T3BrapiHelpers/reference/getGenoProtocolFromGermVec.md)
  : Determine genotyping protocol metadata for a set of accessions
- [`getGenoProtocolFromSingleGerm()`](https://jeanlucj.github.io/T3BrapiHelpers/reference/getGenoProtocolFromSingleGerm.md)
  : Get genotyping protocol metadata for a single germplasm
- [`getGermplasmFromSingleTrial()`](https://jeanlucj.github.io/T3BrapiHelpers/reference/getGermplasmFromSingleTrial.md)
  : Get germplasm metadata for a single trial via BrAPI
- [`getGermplasmFromTrialVec()`](https://jeanlucj.github.io/T3BrapiHelpers/reference/getGermplasmFromTrialVec.md)
  : Get germplasm metadata for multiple trials
- [`getLatLongElevFromLocationVec()`](https://jeanlucj.github.io/T3BrapiHelpers/reference/getLatLongElevFromLocationVec.md)
  : Get location info from a vector of locations via BrAPI
- [`getTraitsFromSingleTrial()`](https://jeanlucj.github.io/T3BrapiHelpers/reference/getTraitsFromSingleTrial.md)
  : Get traits measured from a single trial via BrAPI
- [`getTraitsFromTrialVec()`](https://jeanlucj.github.io/T3BrapiHelpers/reference/getTraitsFromTrialVec.md)
  : Retrieve what traits were measured for a set of trials by study IDs
- [`getTrialMetaDataFromTrialVec()`](https://jeanlucj.github.io/T3BrapiHelpers/reference/getTrialMetaDataFromTrialVec.md)
  : Retrieve metadata for a set of trials by study IDs
- [`makeRowFromGermResult()`](https://jeanlucj.github.io/T3BrapiHelpers/reference/makeRowFromGermResult.md)
  : Convert a BrAPI germplasm result into a single-row data frame
- [`makeRowFromTrialResult()`](https://jeanlucj.github.io/T3BrapiHelpers/reference/makeRowFromTrialResult.md)
  : Convert a BrAPI study result into a single-row data frame
- [`matrix_to_vector_idx()`](https://jeanlucj.github.io/T3BrapiHelpers/reference/matrix_to_vector_idx.md)
  : Map matrix indices to vector index for covariance parameters
